about_the_game:
Step into the arena and unleash your inner champion in FightArena — a thrilling arena fighter where strategy, skill, and sheer willpower reign supreme. As a fearless gladiator, you'll face off against formidable opponents in intense, fast-paced combat, battling for glory and valuable stakes.

FRIENDLY MATCH
Fight ONLINE against a friend to find out who is the better Arena Fighter, but be carefull tho, he might have a better outfit than yours. No worries, you can attain better GEAR by playing the following game modes

DUEL
Customize your gladiator, refine your combat techniques, and build a legacy in a ONLINE world where only the strongest survive. Whether you're a seasoned fighter or a newcomer to the arena, FightArena promises relentless action, epic battles, and endless excitement.

DUNGEONS
Navigate with a FRIEND or ALONE through perilous dungeons teeming with monsters and traps to discover rare loot and powerful artifacts. Every victory earns you not only riches but also enhances your prowess and prepares you for even fiercer challenges ahead.Early Access launches with a single dungeon mode



Prepare for battle, claim your honor, and become the ultimate gladiator in FightArena!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 or equivalent | Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 or equivalent | GeForce GT 640 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Duel against a friend or a stranger, or duel with a friend against others in a PvP and PvE multiplayer arena fighting game.
